title: mod使用外部C++DLL问题
author: tmkmk

replies.author: tmkmk
replies.txt_content:
没有中文.路径放在system32底下.也不存在.关键是       public static void main(String[] args) { hello("Hello,123456!"); } 这一句没有运行.将hello("Hello,123456!");  放到 @EventHandler 下.直接就报错了.
AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed
Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM warning: Using incremental CMS is deprecated and will likely be removed in a future release

replies.author: tmkmk
replies.txt_content: 找到问题所在了.好像是 forge不支持描述符 native. 有啥解决方案的?
